Text:
This release is slightly out of sync.  To correct play with VLC, select Tools, select track synchronization, change the A/V sync so that it says -0.200s.  You will find it plays better this way.  Towards the end you may to change it to -0.300s if you are picky.

-PT
Thanks for the rip, but can I ask when the 720p is coming?
iHD released a 720p.  I'll up it, but it will be later.
Its already up, but also slightly out of sync. Not bad though, vlc can deal with that. Thanks for the reply.
